channel.title: East of State
channel.description: A terrific new website about Kansas City's overlooked places.

item.title: Antique Shop for Generation Y
item.description: History is precious and can teach us a lot about our past. Sometimes, it can even give us a glimpse into the future. With this in mind Chris Harrington, the founder of Westside Storey, took a risk opening a small antique shop in an underdeveloped area with lots of potential. This bustling area known as 17th and Summit, is located in the Westside neighborhood and is creating a stir around the arts district of downtown Kansas City.

item.title: Hattie's Fine Coffee
item.description: Among the suburban familiarity of Prairie Village lies a cozy oasis. Hattie’s Fine Coffee offers the smoothest caffeinated boost in town. This homey establishment, located on 83rd and Mission Rd., is a can’t-miss cafe in the newly-refinished Corinth Square.
